Title: International Watch Co. IWC. SHAFFHAUSEN. Tonneau  man's wristwatch.
Subtitle: Antique 100 Years Old Pocket Watch Movement In New Case
Description: International Watch Co. SHAFFHAUSEN. Tonneau man's wristwatch. Movement: IWC. (100% Authenticity guaranteed) Serial Number: 26180 Case : New stainless steel. Case Size : 34mm X 44 mm. Crystal Type : Domed, mineral glass. Dial : Restored. Strap: Leather For Your attention elegant looking tonneau shape man's wristwatch converted from small pocket watch with high grade IWC movement . New stainless steel case with crystal back professionally made for this small pocket watch movement. Dimensions are 34 mm wide without the crown, 35 mm height without lugs and 44 from lug to lug , and 11 mm thick.. Professionally restored silvered dial with black Arabic numerals signed IWC SHAFFHAUSEN. Stem set/wind movement # 674148 dates this movement to the year of 1917. Movement signed 6 Adjustm’s – INTERNATIONAL WATCH Co. – 17 Jewels. High grade rhodiumed and stripe decorated movement has bimetallic compensated balance wheel, Breguet overcoil balance spring, blued hands. Watch is serviced and oiled and is in good working condition and keeps good time. The watch comes in a new wooden box with a new 20 mm black leather strap.
